task.title: Split a list into two lists
task.shortdesc: You can easily split lists into two when needed.

context.p: Sometimes, you need to reorganize lists or explain a group of items differently from another group. In that case, you have one list that should be split into two different lists.
Enter on a blank list item ends the list if you are on the last list item; otherwise, it splits the list in two.

step.cmd: Place your cursor at the beginning of the list item that will become the first item in a new list.

step.stepresult: A new, empty list item is created.

step.cmd: Press Up arrow to move into the empty list item.

taskbody.result: The empty list item disappears and the single list is now two lists.
taskbody.postreq: You can add text or a heading between the two lists.
